VoiceList.Entry: Sephiroth “How does it feel?”
Sephiroth “It's your first time back to your hometown in a long time,right?”
Sephiroth “So how does it feel?”
“I wouldn't know because I don't have a hometown…”
Cloud “Ummm…how 'bout your parents?”
Sephiroth “My mother is Jenova. She died right after she gave birth to me. My father…”
Sephiroth “What does it matter?”
Sephiroth “All right,let's go.”
Barret “Yo wait a minute!!”
Barret “Isn't that,um?”
Barret “The name of Sephiroth's mother…”
Sephiroth “The Mako smells pretty bad here.”
“Psst… (You keep wandering around here and you'll get in trouble.)”
“It's so boring,being on watch.” You want to do what we always do? Just sit tight,it's your job,right?
Cloud “Shall we practice?”
Cloud “I'll come and talk to you once in a while. Just stick with it.”
“Practice… oh,you mean practice my pose.”
“Do members of SOLDIER always have to worry about what others think?”
“…How did it go?”
“…Was it like this?”
Cloud “Good job!”
“I really don't want to be in SOLDIER.”
Tifa “Cloud…look.”
Tifa “Here's the well…”
Tifa “And that's Gramps' Inn,too.”
Tifa “The only truck in town. It's been here since we were little kids,right?”
Tifa “This is the Nibelheim you remember,right?”
Tifa “It's the same as my Nibelheim. That's why this is…our Nibelheim.”
Tifa “Five years ago…two men from SOLDIER came…”
Tifa “Sephiroth and… a young and vibrant soldier.”
Tifa “Can you tell me again what happened?”
Tifa “No,Cloud.”
Tifa “I've been hiding it for some time, afraid that if I told you …something terrible might happen.”
Tifa “But,I'm not going to hide anything anymore.”
Tifa “You weren't here. Cloud did not come to Nibelheim five years ago.”
Tifa “I…waited. But,Cloud…never came.”
Tifa “The two that were ordered here were Sephiroth and another person…”
Tifa “Five Years ago…I saw the real Sephiroth for the very first time.”
Tifa “So this is…the Great Sephiroth?”
Tifa “But to tell the truth, I thought he was very cold.”
Tifa “I remember a foreboding about him.”
“This is your hometown,right?”
